title: "I'm gonna go refill my mana, be right back. Don't do anything crazy..."
body:
The Rest of my Team: https://giphy.com/gifs/yolo-SWjCswum5dc0E

Me After they've all inevitably died: https://media.giphy.com/media/2vsy0xwHgWxOC2q8n4/giphy.gif

Here's a version of that same GIF from GIPHY. Let's see if it works. But in response:

https://preoccupiedwitharmitage.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/belmont14.gif
why is this in memes and games? this ACTUALLY happens to me every single time, I swear on my life
[I'm used to this level of disappointment ](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/31/Ornn_140.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171213110556)

> [{quoted}](name=wolvius,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Z7fkyXqM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-02-08T22:40:35.980+0000)
>
> [I'm used to this level of disappointment ](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/31/Ornn_140.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171213110556)

https://media.tenor.com/images/736df713e27ebe40efa835e5183b052e/tenor.gif
This is why I have to build mana regen

always remember the golden rule of solo q:

NEVA BACK!

> [{quoted}](name=ShakeNBakeUK,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Z7fkyXqM,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-02-10T21:01:57.665+0000)
>
> always remember the golden rule of solo q:
> 
> NEVA BACK!

Give Summoners Rift the same recalling rules as ARAM! There is none! Yay! Wait... maybe people would actually respect supports more in that case.... or just flame them more... could be fun! Nami, Soraka, Sona, Nid, Kayle.... other healers... forgot where I'm going with this nevermind...

I queue support/fill every game (which gives me Jungle 99% of the time somehow -.- ) and when I actually get support... literally can feed our ADC 5 kills before I go back for the first time to upgrade support item.... and every single time I do, if they dont recall with me... they die... no expections, every time... which I guess is the point of this thread... do bee dooo
this always happens when i leave tower just for a second. i see my ally whos in lane go in like im there with him in spirit.
You should cherish the life of your spirit, keep with it with you and dont leave it with suicidal strangers.
the anime gif looks really good. i like the art.
